Replace.Text: [COLOR_FLOAT_SCIENCE]Aries[ENDCOLOR]:(if turn % 12 = 1)Unit attack will make the enemy move -1 [NEWLINE][COLOR_FLOAT_SCIENCE]Taurus[ENDCOLOR]:(if turn % 12 = 2)Attack has a 33% probability of randomly transmitting enemy units to other locations. [NEWLINE][COLOR_FLOAT_SCIENCE]Gemini[ENDCOLOR]:(if turn % 12 = 3)All units have a 30% probability of producing another self (3 at most). [NEWLINE][COLOR_FLOAT_SCIENCE]Cancer[ENDCOLOR]:(if turn % 12 = 4)There is a 33% chance of causing 33 additional damage when attacking a unit. [NEWLINE][COLOR_FLOAT_SCIENCE]Leo[ENDCOLOR]：(if turn % 12 = 5)Unit death produces space earthquake, causing 33 damage to surrounding units. [NEWLINE][COLOR_FLOAT_SCIENCE]Virgo[ENDCOLOR]:(if turn % 12 = 6)3% probability of triggering bug (reverse angel). [NEWLINE][COLOR_FLOAT_SCIENCE]Libra[ENDCOLOR]：(if turn % 12 = 7)Reversing the cause and effect in space and rebounding the opponent's attack. [NEWLINE][COLOR_FLOAT_SCIENCE]Scorpio[ENDCOLOR]:(if turn % 12 = 8)Killing a unit will create an avatar. [NEWLINE][COLOR_FLOAT_SCIENCE]Sagittarius[ENDCOLOR]:(if turn % 12 = 9)Attack has a 33% probability of banishing the enemy to other space (second kill). [NEWLINE][COLOR_FLOAT_SCIENCE]Capricornus[ENDCOLOR]:(if turn % 12 = 10)The attacking unit has 33% reset attack. (If you are lucky, you can attack indefinitely) [NEWLINE][COLOR_FLOAT_SCIENCE]Aquarius[ENDCOLOR]：(if turn % 12 = 11)Our unit has resumed 11 HP for three rounds since the beginning of this round. [NEWLINE][COLOR_FLOAT_SCIENCE]Pisces[ENDCOLOR]：(if turn % 12 = 0)Jun Ji appeared in the capital. [NEWLINE][COLOR_FLOAT_GOLD]Hei[ENDCOLOR]：(if turn % 12 = 5)Unit has a 33% chance of doing double damage. [NEWLINE][COLOR_FLOAT_GOLD]Vav[ENDCOLOR]：(if turn % 12 = 6)Killing a unit produces an avatar. The man is lazy and has written nothing.
Turn number MOD12 [function mod(TURN,12)] is regarded as QUEEN ability, and turn number corresponds to 12 different abilities respectively.
The dominator of the third field, dressed in snow-white military uniform, has a blue astronomical clock at his left pupil, and holds the pistol and saber of Lucifuge.

[NEWLINE]1 maintenance cost 3 mobility can't be attacked (almost can't be attacked by AI), but can only be obtained by Pisces . [NEWLINE]When there are 10 Jun Ji and the number of rounds is greater than 120, a TOKISAKI KURUMI will be summoned at the beginning of the next round, and the angel will be reversed (if Lucifuge is lost, Zafkiel will be obtained, which can be reversed by the Yud·Bet).

Shadow, 12 maintenance costs, 3 movement force, 100 attack, can only be obtained by the Het. [NEWLINE] Ability: Dalet, the health value is locked to 100, and the corresponding psychic power (gold coin) will be reduced when injured, which is invalid for force majeure. In order to maintain one's own existence, spiritual power (gold coin) cannot be used when it is less than 100 (invalid).

Combat power, health is equal to the number of rounds, mobility is equal to one tenth of the number of rounds, and maintenance cost is equal to one third of the number of rounds. The battle panel does not display extra combat health, but more than 100 health exists in the form of shield. The value of the injured shield is restored to life, and the remaining movement force of the shield is restored at the end of the turn. Maintenance fee is deducted directly at the beginning of the round. (only by reversing the call)
Built by a flying cat. . . Architecture? ? ? [NEWLINE]+3 housing, +3 livability, 3 maintenance, 333 hammer (which can be superimposed with the arena).
